heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly sunny east of the Greens; mostly cloudy west, with the chance of a flurry in New York. Highs from the mid 20s to around 30, some lower 20s northeast. Winds variable to south at around 5 mph, gusting to 10 mph in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy north, with scattered and light snow showers, mainly late. Partly cloudy south, with the chance of a snow shower from the southern Greens westward. Lows from 5 to 15 above, cold spots around zero. Light winds, variable to south.

heading: Wednesday
text: Partly to mostly sunny in the south. Mostly cloudy north with scattered morning snow showers, then some clearing in the Champlain Valley. Highs in the low to mid 20s north, mid 20s to around 30 in the south. Winds becoming west to northwest 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 15 mph.
